plays.text: Penalty to Scott Parker 2 minutes for Crosschecking Sebastien Bordeleau
Goal scored by Ladislav Nagy assisted by Claude Lemieux and Sergei Berezin
Penalty to Sergei Berezin 2 minutes for Holding Milan Hejduk
Penalty to Chris Drury 2 minutes for Elbowing Denis Pederson
Penalty to Radim Vrbata 2 minutes for Tripping Teppo Numminen
Penalty to Joe Sakic 2 minutes for Hooking Ossi Vaananen
Penalty to Ossi Vaananen 2 minutes for Diving Joe Sakic
Penalty to Teppo Numminen 2 minutes for Interference Chris Drury
Penalty to Milan Hejduk 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Denis Pederson
Penalty to Todd Simpson 2 minutes for Holding Joe Sakic
Penalty to Drake Berehowsky 2 minutes for Tripping Brian Willsie
Goal scored by Alex Tanguay assisted by Rob Blake and Joe Sakic
Goal scored by KELLY FAIRCHILD assisted by Brian Willsie and Todd Gill
Penalty to Landon Wilson 2 minutes for Elbowing Todd Gill
Penalty to Greg de Vries 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Daymond Langkow assisted by Daniel Briere and Teppo Numminen
Penalty to Robert Esche 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Ville Nieminen assisted by Greg de Vries and Adam Foote
